energy.title: Energy saver
energy.desc: LED is a highly energy efficient lighting technology. Residential LEDs use at least 75% less energy, and last 25 times longer, than incandescent lighting.

design.title: Design for you
design.desc: Getting the lighting right is essential for any space in the home, Good design can help set the mood or define the functionality of a room.

quality.title: High-quality products
quality.desc: Cloudybay Lighting manufactures energy efficient lighting in the most current and popular styles, using only the highest quality components.
